questions: How long have you lived in the house or apartment you’re living in now?
What do you like about this house or apartment?
What kind of home would you like to live in in the future?
What work do you do?
How easy is it to get this kind of work in your country?
How important is it to you to have work that you enjoy doing?
Do you come from a city, town or village?
What do you like about your home city/town/village?
Is your home city/town/village a good place for young people?
Where do you work?
How do you usually travel to work?
How do you feel after you finish a day at work?
Do you like to watch adverts on the internet or TV?
Do you notice advertising in public places?
Is there an advert that you remember well from in childhood?
Would you like to work in advertising industry?

Are there many crowded places where you live?
Would you prefer to have a holiday in a crowded place, or a quiet place?
Do people in your country often celebrate together?
What do you need to remember to do every day?
Have you ever forgotten to do something important?

What do you do to help you remember to do things?
What colours do you like most?
What colour of a car you would like to buy?

Do you believe the things you read about famous people?
Have you ever played a video game in your childhood?
Are you interested in watching other people play video games?

Do you think some people spend too much time playing video games?
Do your friends and family use social media?

Do you spend too much time on social media?
When did you start using social media?

Have you ever made a cake yourself?
How often do you eat something sweet after a meal?

Which singers do you like most?
Do people in your country often sing songs?
Do you often feel bored?
What sort of things do you find most boring?

Are you bored more easily now than when you were younger?

Have you ever lost any sunglasses?

What’s the best thing about being the age you are now?
What do you want to do five years later?

How often do you use a credit card to pay for things?
Will you use cash more often in the future?
What do you think about using apps to pay for things?
Do you like music?
What kinds of music do you listen to?
Is it easy to learn music?
Do you learn music lessons at school?
Did you like to study geography at school?
Is what you learned in geography very useful to you now?
Would you like to be a geography teacher?
Are you interested in finding out more about the geography of other countries?

How do you feel about eating fish?

Would you ever watch a TV programme or film about fish?

Do you like to help people?
When was the last time someone helped you?

Have you ever given someone a present that you made yourself?

Do you ever go out to drink tea or coffee?
Would you offer a visitor to your home tea or coffee?
When was the last time you drank tea or coffee?

What do you think of running as a form of exercise?
When was the last time you ran?
Are there any good places for running near where you live?

Do you know how to play any musical instruments?

Do you think it is easy to learn to play a musical instrument?

Do you prefer comfortable clothes or smart clothes?

Do you think watching films is a good way to spend time with friends?
